summary:
The PlayStation 4 (PS4) is a popular video game console made by Sony. It was released in 2013 and is part of the eighth generation of gaming consoles. The PS4 has powerful hardware, allowing it to play games with amazing graphics. It also focuses on social features, letting players stream and share gameplay online. The controller is improved, with a touchpad added.

The PS4 was well-received, praised for its performance, support for indie games, and lack of strict digital rights management. It became the second-best-selling console of all time, behind the PlayStation 2. Sony later released the PS4 Slim and PS4 Pro with enhanced features.
title: PlayStation 4
